name: Nike Air Max 270
description: The Nike Air Max 270 delivers visible air under every step with a lightweight and breathable design. It has a large Max Air unit for cushioning and a rubber outsole for durable traction.

name: Adidas Ultraboost
description: The Adidas Ultraboost 21 is designed for runners seeking a responsive and comfortable ride. It features an updated Primeknit upper and Boost cushioning for a smooth and energized stride.

name: Vans Old Skool
description: The Vans Old Skool is a classic skate shoe that's been reimagined as a fashion staple. It features a low profile design and the iconic side stripe.

name: Converse All Star
description: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star is a timeless classic that's perfect for any casual outfit. It features a canvas upper and the iconic rubber toe cap.

name: Adidas Yeezy
description: The YEEZY BOOST 350 V2features an upper composed of re-engineered Primeknit. The post-dyed monofilament side stripe is woven into the upper. Reflective threads are woven into the laces. The midsole utilizes adidas innovative BOOSTâ„¢ technology.

name: Nike Air Jordan
description: Every time the AJ1 gets a remake, you get the classic sneaker in new colours and textures for an exciting, revamped look but with all the familiar comforts you know. Premium materials and accents give modern expression to an all-time favourite.

name: PUMA x Karl Lagerfeld
description: The KARL LAGERFELD Sneakers striped logo and reflective accents combine with a bulky rubber sole to create a futuristic vision of wavy disproportions.

name: New Balance Revlite
description: New Balance featuring a lace-up front fastening, a flat heel, a round toe and a panelled colour block design. These styles are supplied by a premium sneaker and street wear marketplace. Stocking only the most sought-after footwear and clothing, they source and curate some of the most hard-to-find items from around the world.
